Class DefaultLPCProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • amesmarket.DefaultLPCProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILoadProfileCollectionProvider

    public class DefaultLPCProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILoadProfileCollectionProvider
    Default LoadProfileCollection provider. Probably the only one that will ever be used, other than for testing.

      • determineActualScenario

        public void determineActualScenario(java.util.Random random)
        Determine which of LoadScenarios will be used as the 'simulated true load'. The supplied random number generate will be used to choose one of the scenarios wrt the probability of choosing each scenario.
        Specified by:
        determineActualScenario in interface ILoadProfileCollectionProvider
        Parameters:
        random -
        Throws:
        unchecked - runtime exception.
        See Also:
        amesmarket.ILoadProfileCollectionProvider#determineActualScenario(int)

        Adjust the loads in the scenarios to be a certain margin below the generation capacity.
        Specified by:

        capMargin - as decimal representation of the percentage. e.g. 0.15 not 15%. between -1 and 1.
